bruce wrote:
> not asking if the app can fill out a form... but i would definitely need to
> do a post based on the information residing in the drop down for a given
> page....
> 
> which is why i was asking if the app had the flexibility/intelligence to be
> able to iterate through a dropdown menu, and return the subsequent
> underlying pages/content...
> 
> most of the crawl/spider apps that i've seen don't have the capacity to do
> this...

There are many ways to implement drop-down menues -- including using HTML
form elements and javascript/DHTML -- and then many ways to react to the
user choice and send the browser to a new location.

Some of these -- when the elements on the page contain obvious URIs --
Heritrix handles well. Others, which compose target URIs from multiple
Javascript variables, are essentially opaque to Heritrix.

The only way to see if it works on a particular page is to run it against
that page.

- Gordon @ IA
